title: Change selected button color to blue

Hover and focus-visible states remain accessible (visible focus ring, sufficient contrast).
Disabled state remains visually distinct and consistent with the blue styling.
No other buttons or global theme colors are changed; only the selected buttonâ€™s styling is affected.
The app compiles and runs without UI regressions.

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3]/button[1].
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
